Html:
I've downloaded PHPExcel, extracted it, and copied the directory to my linux server.  I have php 5.3.3.  It is complaining about this error message when it is trying to load autoloader.php.  Can someone please help me understand what the problem and point me in a direction in which I can start troubleshooting.

Thanks.

 

Autoloader.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /www/phpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/IOFactory.php on line 37
Do you have any other libraries, frameworks or script running that might be clashing with PHPExcel's autoloader?
I am such an idiot.  I forgot to push the autolader.php to the server.
